title: Forever 27
description: A phone call in the middle of the night changes two people's lives forever but the consequences will last them an eternity.A metamorphosis will take place and leave them something different and changed. What will survive and what will be left of them is anyone's guess.Take a trip into the unknown and know what it feels like to be twenty-seven forever...Novelette Length [Not including excerpts]: 12,075 (48 Paperback Pages)**Includes an Afterword by the author, a four chapter excerpt from Mortal Death, Book One from The Vamp Saga.**
author: Danielle Blanchard Benson
